005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import java.util.List;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022
023/**
024 * Based on the XPath 3.1
025 * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-round">fn:round</a>
026 * functions.
027 */
028public final class FnRound {
029  private static final String NAME = "round";
030
031  @NonNull
032  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
033      .name(NAME)
034      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
035      .deterministic()
036      .contextIndependent()
037      .focusIndependent()
038      .argument(IArgument.builder()
039          .name("arg")
040          .type(INumericItem.class)
041          .zeroOrOne()
042          .build())
043      .returnType(INumericItem.class)
044      .returnZeroOrOne()
045      .functionHandler(FnRound::executeOneArg)
046      .build();
047
048  @NonNull
049  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_WITH_PRECISION = IFunction.builder()
050      .name(NAME)
051      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
052      .deterministic()
053      .contextIndependent()
054      .focusIndependent()
055      .argument(IArgument.builder()
056          .name("arg1")
057          .type(INumericItem.class)
058          .zeroOrOne()
059          .build())
060      .argument(IArgument.builder()
061          .name("precision")
062          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
063          .one()
064          .build())
065      .returnType(INumericItem.class)
066      .returnZeroOrOne()
067      .functionHandler(FnRound::executeTwoArg)
068      .build();
069
070  private FnRound() {
071    // disable construction
072  }
073
074  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
075  @NonNull
076  private static ISequence<INumericItem> executeOneArg(
077      @NonNull IFunction function,
078      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
079      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
080      IItem focus) {
081    ISequence<? extends INumericItem> sequence = FunctionUtils.asType(
082        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
083
084    INumericItem item = sequence.getFirstItem(true);
085    if (item == null) {
086      return ISequence.empty(); // NOPMD - readability
087    }
088
089    return ISequence.of(item.round());
090  }
091
092  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
093  @NonNull
094  private static ISequence<INumericItem> executeTwoArg(
095      @NonNull IFunction function,
096      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
097      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
098      IItem focus) {
099    ISequence<? extends INumericItem> sequence = FunctionUtils.asType(
100        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
101
102    INumericItem item = sequence.getFirstItem(true);
103    if (item == null) {
104      return ISequence.empty(); // NOPMD - readability
105    }
106
107    IIntegerItem precision = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
108
109    return ISequence.of(item.round(precision));
110  }
111}
